The requests presented vnto the French King, by the generall deputies of the Reformed Churches of France Together with his Maiesties answers therevnto. Eglises réformées de France. Maniald, Étienne. Montmartin, Esaïe du mats de. France. Sovereign (1610-1643 : Louis XIII)
[2], 15, [1] p.
Printed [by J. Dawson] for Nathaniel Butter and William Sheffard, London : 1623.
Printer's name from STC. Signed at end: Montmartin Deputy Generall. Maniald Deputy Generall. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

[2], 15, [1] p.
Printed [by J. Dawson] for Nathaniel Butter and William Sheffard, London : 1623.
Printer's name from STC. Signed at end: Montmartin Deputy Generall. Maniald Deputy Generall. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
